TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example shows how to use the ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs.
[!code-cs[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#2](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/resolveaddressasync/resolvecivicaddressasync.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.ResolveCivicAddressAsync#2](../../add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/resolvecivicaddressasync/resolvecivicaddressasync.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public ResolveAddressCompletedEventArgs (System.Device.Location.CivicAddress address, Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Device.Location.CivicAddress address, class System.Exception error, bool cancelled, object userState) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> that contains the address resolved from the latitude/longitude location, if successful.
The exception object for any exception that may have occurred during the attempt to resolve the address.
`true` if the operation was cancelled; otherwise, `false`.
A token for tracking the request to resolve the address. May be `null` if not used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor is public so that classes implementing the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver> interface can create this object to fire events.

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> associated with the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
Docs.value: The <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress"> associated with the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event. If the address could not be resolved, this property returns <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>.
